website_summaries.verdict: Distinctive and modern lead-free glassware made in Italy.
pros: The SON.hyx glass is smooth and can even resist fingerprints
Smooth, with a wide bowl, these are durable and classy
Comes with a 25 year guarantee that covers discoloration as well as rim and foot chipping
cons: Check the dimensions, since they don’t fit in all wine glass racks

customer_reviews.title: These do the job
customer_reviews.text: The generous size of these wine glasses allows for proper aeration of the wine within. I use these more than my Riedels for that very reason. After looking at over a dozen choices, I can say that the QPR of these wine glasses is amazing. I would easily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fragile
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so incredibly fragile they break at the slightest touch. I broke one while placing it in the dishwasher and as far as I can tell they're supposed to be dish washer safe. I broke another while putting it away on the shelf. Just unbelievably fragile. I expected so much better for such a high price.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Linares

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses. Even more than the other brands!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a competitor brand that starts with an R, and they just weren’t as nice as these. These glasses are seamless. They are smooth from top to bottom and they manage to stay cleaner, less finger prints. They’re beautiful and they still fit in the cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Cherries27

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but they are not terribly strong.
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses. I review them almost every year. Why you ask, because my friends are idiots and we break them constantly. I am giving them 4 start because I love the glass, the design, and we drink illegal quantities of pinot. However, the claim these are made from some special space age glass and are stronger is absurd. I put one in my dish washer last night....my wife called me this morning and said I broke it????? Maybe I put it in the dishwasher in some odd way, but I am calling BS on that one. They just are not terribly strong.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy wine glasses

We have a horrible track record with glasses and I've broke every set I've ever had, but these have lasted through so many bangs and bumps that would have broke other glasses. Thoroughly satisfied, and they're lovely nice glasses on top of how durable they are.

product_meta.title: Luigi Bormioli Atelier Pinot Noir Wine Glass, 20-5/8-Ounce, Set of 6
product_meta.description: Like all Luigi Bormioli collections, Atelier embodies Italy's gusto for the good things of the earth: our wines and foods that are uniquely Italian, but loved the world over. An extensive collection of graceful glasses whose angled bowls add interest to the design and more surface for refracting light through beverages. Atelier stemware is machine blown in Parma Italy and made in Luigi Bormioli's proprietary SON.hyx material. SON.hyx produced glassware is an exciting fusion of elegance and technology. In addition to having ideal bowl shapes, fine rims and beautifully drawn stems, glassware made in SON.hyx is extremely brilliant in color, has a beautiful sound, maintains its clarity after thousands of industrial dishwashing cycles and possesses an extremely high level of durability. The stems are also reinforced with titanium.
feature_bullets: 21 oz wine glasses come in a set of 6
SON.hyx - High-Tech blown lead-free crystal glass, is break resistant and dishwasher safe
Titanium Reinforced - Permanent anti-abrasion treatment applied directly to the glass’ stems to increase resistance to breakages
Fine, reinforced and laser cut rims
Pulled stems do not have any mold seams and are highly flexible
Flat foot to guarantee better stability and easy to hold
